modName: The Hermit Armor Mod Temperable and Craftable
summary: This is a version of the original mod by newermind43, so all credits go to him. You can find his original mod here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49776/?. However it is not needed as I have included all the data files in it.
descriptionHtml:
Basically Newermind43, made a great armor mod, which I love, however he didnt make the armor craftable or temperable. So basically what I did was made it craftable and temperable, as well as bump up the damage resistance of the cuirass a little bit, as well as remove the chest in skyhaven temple, which originally contained this armor, oh and I renamed it Nightwalker.

HOW TO CRAFT?
author: Newermind43
